metadata.title: CVE-2021-37966 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Compositing in Google Chrome on Androidprior to 94.0.4606.54 allowed a remote attacker to spoof the contents ofthe Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
